altername_name: Cooking Guide: Can't decide what to eat?
La Guida in Cucina: Che Si Mangia Oggi
Leçons de cuisine: Qu'allons-nous manger aujourd'hui?
Kochkurs: Was Wollen Wir Heute Kochen
Sekai no Gohan: Shaberu! DS Oryouri Navi
name: Personal Trainer: Cooking
overview: Personal Trainer: Cooking includes more than 200 recipes from around the world and transforms the Nintendo DS into an electronic, interactive cookbook, complete with a glossary of terms and even instructional videos.
